name: portfolio-builder
description: Full-stack portfolio builder application with NestJS, GraphQL, Next.js, and PostgreSQL

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.docker:psql: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U portfolio_user -d portfolio_mvp
scripts.db:setup: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.start: npm run docker:up && npm run dev
